tool.name: SAGA.climate_tools.14
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTMIN True isArrayTMAX True output_data_FREQUENCY $output_data_FREQUENCY output_data_DT_MEAN $output_data_DT_MEAN output_data_DT_MAX $output_data_DT_MAX output_data_DT_STDV $output_data_DT_STDV output_data_TMIN_MEAN $output_data_TMIN_MEAN output_data_TMIN_MIN $output_data_TMIN_MIN name SAGA.climate_tools.14 TMIN $TMIN TMAX $TMAX prefer $prefer response $response outputType_FREQUENCY $OutputSection_FREQUENCY.outputType_FREQUENCY transmissionMode_FREQUENCY $OutputSection_FREQUENCY.transmissionMode_FREQUENCY outputType_DT_MEAN $OutputSection_DT_MEAN.outputType_DT_MEAN transmissionMode_DT_MEAN $OutputSection_DT_MEAN.transmissionMode_DT_MEAN outputType_DT_MAX $OutputSection_DT_MAX.outputType_DT_MAX transmissionMode_DT_MAX $OutputSection_DT_MAX.transmissionMode_DT_MAX outputType_DT_STDV $OutputSection_DT_STDV.outputType_DT_STDV transmissionMode_DT_STDV $OutputSection_DT_STDV.transmissionMode_DT_STDV outputType_TMIN_MEAN $OutputSection_TMIN_MEAN.outputType_TMIN_MEAN transmissionMode_TMIN_MEAN $OutputSection_TMIN_MEAN.transmissionMode_TMIN_MEAN outputType_TMIN_MIN $OutputSection_TMIN_MIN.outputType_TMIN_MIN transmissionMode_TMIN_MIN $OutputSection_TMIN_MIN.transmissionMode_TMIN_MIN

param.name: TMIN
param.label: Minimum Temperature
param.help: Monthly (12) or daily (365) temperature observations. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, png, tiff

param.name: TMAX
param.label: Maximum Temperature
param.help: Monthly (12) or daily (365) temperature observations. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, png, tiff

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_FREQUENCY
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_FREQUENCY
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_DT_MEAN
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_DT_MEAN
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_DT_MAX
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_DT_MAX
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_DT_STDV
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_DT_STDV
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_TMIN_MEAN
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_TMIN_MEAN
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_TMIN_MIN
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_TMIN_MIN
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This tool calculates statistics about the frost change frequency either from monthly or daily minimum and maximum temperatures. In case of monthly observations these will be spline interpolated to gain a daily resolution.
